PAGE_DESCRIPTION: With axis, you can send money to friends instantly and for free, buy anything online, request money from anyone, earn rewards and cashback, and understand your spending habits so that you can budget.
SECTION_ONE_SALES_CARD_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: New to axis and want to chat to someone to learn more? Contact us for our Business Proposition or for our consumer proposition.
SECTION_ONE_SUPPORT_CARD_TITLE_DESCRIPTI: Do you have a question about using axis or a problem with your account? Check out our FAQs. Still need help? Fill our our support form.
SECTION_ONE_PARTNERSHIP_CARD_TITLE_DESCR: Want to partner with axis? Contact us here: Partnerships@axisapp.com
SECTION_TWO_DESCRIPTION_PART_ONE: Or Get in touch by calling our customer
SECTION_TWO_DESCRIPTION_PART_THREE_THREE: to chat with us through Whatsapp
